name: The Beam Side Table by Kelly Hoppen - Davidson
description: Discover the Beam Side Table, a stunning result of the creative partnership between renowned designer Kelly Hoppen and DAVIDSON. This luxury side table embodies the essence of effortless elegance, seamlessly blending form and function. Raised on taupe ash legs, the Beam Side Table offers a refined canvas for styling and practical use. The legs, inspired by Kelly Hoppen's signature taupe, exude a light brown tint, adding a touch of warmth and sophistication. The table features a striking contrast between the black lacquered top and the veneer legs, creating a visual focal point that captures the eye. Supported by three tapered legs, the Beam Side Table stands as a testament to meticulous craftsmanship and thoughtful design. Elevate your interior with the Beam Side Table, a harmonious collaboration between Kelly Hoppen and DAVIDSON. This exceptional piece transcends the ordinary, becoming a statement of style, sophistication, and luxury that will be cherished for years to come.
